detail_desc: Short jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie/bow tie.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a sequin motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a high waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester. Buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft matt finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, chin guard and a zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the back of the waist and ribbing containing glittery threads at the cuffs. Lined.
Gently fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with peak lapels, a French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in textured-knit jersey made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Striped jumper in a soft cotton knit with buttons at the top, raglan sleeves with reverse-stitched seams and a small fabric appliqué at the hem.

Calf-length kaftan dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Gently tapered waist with pleats front and back and a detachable tie belt, and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a frill trim in a broderie anglaise weave around the neckline and cuffs.
Patterned bikini. Top with a lined front and flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that cross at the back. Fully lined bottoms with a flounce at the top.

Padded all-in-one suit in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed, padded hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, elastication at the back and reinforced sections at the back and knees. Small zipped pocket at the top, and covered elastication at the cuffs and hems. Reflective details. Fleece lining. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, and a yoke front and back. Flap chest pockets with a button, front pockets and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in satin. Shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, front pockets and long sleeves with narrow cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Fitted, smocked top woven in a linen blend with elasticated shoulder straps, buttons down the front and frill trims.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and legs with creases.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Henley shirts in soft cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Baby Exclusive. Socks in a soft, fine-knit organic cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, ties and plastic rings at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Long tunic in soft cotton twill with a button placket, yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.

Popover jacket in a sturdy cotton weave with a detachable, lined hood, fake buttons at the top and a diagonal zip down the front. Flap front pocket, a yoke at the back and raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Patterned lining.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a round neckline and buttons at the top.
Fully lined swimsuits with an all-over print and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Small embroidered detail on the chest, and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Block-patterned top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit cotton with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a high, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in airy, patterned plumeti chiffon with 3/4-length sleeves. Elastication and a flounce at the top, cuffs and hem. Partly lined.
Pyjamas with a short-sleeved top and pair of shorts in soft, patterned jersey. Top with an overlocked edge on the sleeves and at the hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
Dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow elastication and a wide flounce at the top, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short-sleeved jersey top.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slightly longer top in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Hi-top trainers in suede and leather with a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Platform 3 cm.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs with jersey ribbing at the hems.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Ankle boots in leather with decorative straps and a zip in the side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Short-sleeved “Best friends” tops in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.

Calf-length dress in soft viscose twill with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Tapered waist with decorative pleats front and back, and long, slightly wider sleeves with gathers and buttons at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with worn details, a regular waist and decorative studs on the front. Zip fly and button and a raw-edge, frayed hem.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, belt, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Wide, calf-length dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with ties at the neck and a V-shaped opening at the front. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the hips and at the hem of the skirt for added volume. Lined with a detachable V-neck underdress in jersey. The underdress has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the outer fabric of the dress is partly recycled. The polyester content of the underdress is recycled.

Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a brushed thermal inside, elastication and a concealed drawstring waist, a zipped key pocket at the back and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.
Round sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses. The top section of the frames is chain shaped.
Leggings in an extra-soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with tiers to the hem. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline, gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
V-neck body in soft, ribbed jersey with a draped wrapover top layer at the front. Narrow shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Oversized utility jacket in a soft linen blend with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and a stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with an opening and adjustable press-stud fastenings at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets, flap side pockets, a drawstring at the waist and decorative grosgrain at the hem. Cotton lining.
Cardigan in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders and no buttons.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Scarf in an airy weave with fringes along the sides.
Polo shirt in a soft, fine knit with a rib-knit collar, button placket, low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and straight hem.

Push-up bras in soft cotton jersey with underwired, moulded, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.

Wide, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a V-shaped opening and wide ties at the neckline. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Silk top with a V-neck and spaghetti straps. Lined.
Fine-knit gloves with a print motif on the uppers and ribbed cuffs.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a collar, V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Skirt in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and adjustable straps that cross at the back.
Longjohns with an elasticated waist and flatlock seams. Made from fast-drying functional fabric designed to keep you warm.

Calf-length dress in a snakeskin-patterned, airy weave with a draped front and decorative wrapover detail at the top. Long sleeves with a width that creates an asymmetric finish, draping with a sewn-in wrapover at the back, a seam at the waist and draped skirt with a slit at the front. Concealed zip in one side. Lined skirt.
5-pocket, slim-fit shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details and a print motif. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and frayed, raw-edge hem.
Top in soft, sequined sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
